text: main ( ) { int T ; scanf ( "%d" , & T ) ; while ( T -- ) { int i , N ; scanf ( "%d" , & N ) ; long A [ N ] , cost = 0 ; for ( i = 0 ; i < N ; i ++ ) scanf ( "%ld" , & A [ i ] ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < N - 1 ; i ++ ) { if ( A [ i ] < A [ i + 1 ] ) { cost = cost + A [ i ] ; int t = A [ i ] ; A [ i ] = A [ i + 1 ] ; A [ i + 1 ] = t ; } else cost = cost + A [ i + 1 ] ; } printf ( "%ld\n" , cost ) ; } }
